description: It is confirmed near Kington and a protection zone is in place, with all birds due to be culled.
title: Bird flu outbreak confirmed at Herefordshire chicken farm
title_page: Bird flu outbreak confirmed at Herefordshire chicken farm - BBC News
maintext:
A bird flu outbreak has been confirmed at a commercial chicken farm in Herefordshire.
The virus was recorded near Kington earlier, prompting a 3km (1.8 mile) protection zone being put in place.
A government spokesperson said all poultry on the premises would be culled but done so humanely.
A 10km (6.2 mile) surveillance zone, which extends into Wales, has also been implemented.
